mapper.select: SELECT accounting_sales_admin_idx AS accountingSalesAdminIdx , company_idx AS companyIdx , inventory_idx AS inventoryIdx , company_contract_idx AS companyContractIdx , accounting_sales_admin_date AS accountingSalesAdminDate , accounting_sales_admin_type AS accountingSalesAdminType , accounting_sales_admin_payment AS accountingSalesAdminPayment , accounting_sales_admin_sum AS accountingSalesAdminSum , admin_username AS adminUsername , accounting_sales_admin_update AS accountingSalesAdminUpdate , accounting_sales_admin_finish_update AS accountingSalesAdminFinishUpdate FROM accouting_sales_admin
